Toggle Menu

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean

DigitalOcean Cloud Module

The DigitalOcean cloud module is used to control access to the DigitalOcean VPS system.

Use of this module only requires the api_key parameter to be set. Set up the cloud configuration at /etc/salt/cloud.providers or /etc/salt/cloud.providers.d/digital_ocean.conf: 

my-digital-ocean-config:
  # DigitalOcean account keys
  client_key: wFGEwgregeqw3435gDger
  api_key: GDE43t43REGTrkilg43934t34qT43t4dgegerGEgg
  provider: digital_ocean
depends

requests

avail_images

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.avail_images(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the images that are on the provider

avail_locations

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.avail_locations(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM locations on the cloud provider with relevant data

avail_sizes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.avail_sizes(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the image sizes that are on the provider

create

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.create(
								vm_
								)

Details

Create a single VM from a data dict

create_node

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.create_node(
								args
								)

Details

Create a node

destroy

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.destroy(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Destroy a node. Will check termination protection and warn if enabled.

CLI Example:

salt-cloud --destroy mymachine

get_configured_provider

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.get_configured_provider( )

Details

Return the first configured instance.

get_image

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.get_image(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the image object to use

get_keyid

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.get_keyid(
								keyname
								)

Details

Return the ID of the keyname

get_location

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.get_location(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the VM's location

get_size

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.get_size(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the VM's size. Used by create_node().

list_keypairs

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.list_keypairs(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM locations on the cloud provider with relevant data

list_nodes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.list_nodes(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_full

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.list_nodes_full(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_select

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.list_nodes_select(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider, with select fields

query

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.query(
								method='droplets',
								droplet_id=None,
								command=None,
								args=None
								)

Details

Make a web call to DigitalOcean

script

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.script(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the script deployment object

show_instance

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.show_instance(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details from DigitalOcean concerning a droplet

show_keypair

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.digital_ocean.show_keypair(
								kwargs=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details of an SSH keypair
